text: Mairzee Almas is a Canadian television director. Her credits include Smallville, Lost Girl, Beauty & the Beast and the North American adaptation of Being Human. Prior to this, she worked as an assistant director on film and television.Mairzee Almas - Movies & TV, The New York Times ==Filmography== *Smallville *Lost Girl *Beauty & the Beast *Being Human *iZombie *Alphas *Haven *Defiance *The 100 *Motive *12 Monkeys *Supergirl *Arrow *Legends of Tomorrow *Jessica Jones *Midnight, Texas *Iron Fist *Outlander *Impluse *Ascension (miniseries) *Another Life *Batwoman ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Canadian television directors Category:Women television directors Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mairzee Almas
